ROW.NAME: Line thermal rating
ROW.CMT: Line thermal rating: A or B or C or D

ROW.NAME: Line 15-minute rating
ROW.CMT: Line 15-minute rating: A or B or C or D

ROW.NAME: Transformer nameplate rating
ROW.CMT: Transformer nameplate rating: MVA1 or MVA2 or MVA3

ROW.NAME: Transformer emergency rating
ROW.CMT: Transformer emergency rating: MVA1 or MVA2 or MVA3

ROW.NAME: Series capacitor emergency rating
ROW.CMT: User-defined field for series capacitor emergency rating

ROW.NAME: TAGS
ROW.CMT: Tags for equipment in kV range: 0-200

ROW.NAME: AREA
ROW.CMT: Area range. e.g 1,2,4-10 ('' for entire network)

ROW.NAME: ZONE
ROW.CMT: Zone range. e.g 1,4,4-10 ('' for entire network)
